H

handleClosing() - Method in class mdscssRoot.MMODFrame
The handleClosing function is called when the operator attempts to close the application.
handleCodeRed() - Method in class mdscssRoot.MMODFrame
The handleCodeRed function is sent by the MDSCSSController when connection to one or more of the subsystems has been lost and has not been re-established for over 5 minutes.
handleControlLogic() - Method in class mdscssControl.MDSCSSController
The handleControlLogic function is called periodically by the control thread to handle automatic or forgiving control logic dictated by the system control mode.
handleDetModeChange(String) - Method in class mdscssRoot.MMODFrame
The handleDetModeChange function is sent by the MDSCSSController when the detonation override mode for an interceptor has been changed automatically.
handleInitialUpdate() - Method in class mdscssRoot.InterceptorOverviewPanel
The handleInitialUpdate function is called when the MDSCSS achieves connection to the subsystems.
handleInitialUpdate() - Method in class mdscssRoot.MMODFrame
The handleInitialUpdate function is called when the MDSCSS achieves connection to the subsystems.
handleInitialUpdate() - Method in class mdscssRoot.SMCDPanel
The handleInitialUpdate function is called when the MDSCSS achieves connection to the subsystems.
handleInitialUpdate() - Method in class mdscssRoot.TheatreMapPanel
The handleInitialUpdate function is called when the MDSCSS achieves connection to the subsystems.
handleInitialUpdate() - Method in class mdscssRoot.ThreatOverviewPanel
The handleInitialUpdate function is called when the MDSCSS achieves connection to the subsystems.
handleLaunchModeChange() - Method in class mdscssRoot.MMODFrame
The handleLaunchModeChange function is sent by the MDSCSSController when no alternative interceptor for assignment has been found while in forgiving control.
handleSelChange(String) - Method in class mdscssRoot.InterceptorOverviewPanel
The handleSelChange function is called when a new interceptor has been selected by the SMCD; makes it so the new active interceptor selection has its corresponding row highlighted.
handleSelChange(String) - Method in class mdscssRoot.SMCDPanel
The handleSelChange function is called when the a new interceptor is selected in the interceptor overview panel.
handleSubsystemFailure() - Method in class mdscssRoot.MMODFrame
The handleSubsystemFailure function is sent by the MDSCSSController when connection to one or more of the subsystems has been lost.
handleThreatDestruction(String) - Method in class mdscssRoot.MMODFrame
The handleThreatDestruction function is called by the MDSCSS when the TSS indicates that a threat has been destroyed.
handleThrustControl() - Method in class mdscssControl.MDSCSSController
The handleThrustControl function is called by the control thread every second to determine the power levels of each in-flight interceptor and send the thrust commands.
handleWatchdogTimer() - Method in class mdscssControl.MDSCSSController
The handleWatchdogTimer function is called by the control thread every 0.5 seconds to notify the SMSS that the MDSCSS is still operational.
hideExpandControls() - Method in class mdscssRoot.SMCDPanel
The hideExpandControls function is called by the SMCD wrapper to hide the "open in new window" icon for SMCD panels that are already opened in a new window.
